DOC.brief_summary: That SPECT brain imaging tracks and is consistent with clinical history and physical exam as well as cognitive testing.
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy and SPECT Brain Imaging in Carbon Monoxide Poisoning
DOC.detailed_description: The study is a retrospective review of the PI's experience using SPECT brain imaging and hyperbaric oxygen therapy in the diagnosis and treatment of non-acute phases of carbon monoxide poisoning. The purpose is to see if the SPECT brain imaging is consistent with the clinical condition and cognitive testing on the patients.
DOC.criteria: Adults and children with nonacute carbon monoxide poisoning who underwent SPECT brain imaging as part of their evaluation and treatment
